caption.title: Global climate change impacts on agricultural welfare indicators (% of projected global GDP in the SRES A2 scenario; without CO 2 fertilization effect).
caption.p: For each climate scenario (19 GCMs) used in the analysis, actual modeled changes in welfare are represented by dots, whereas solid lines for all three panels connect average values of calculated impacts for every simulated time step. Shaded areas depict double SD from the mean.
